param.name: input_file
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset.
param.label: SAM/BAM dataset to mark duplicates in

param.name: out_prefix
param.help: Use this remind you what the job was for
param.label: Title for the output file

param.name: remDups
param.help: If true do not write duplicates to the output file instead of writing them with appropriate flags set.
param.label: Remove duplicates from output file

param.name: assumeSorted
param.help: If true assume input data are already sorted (most Galaxy SAM/BAM should be).
param.label: Assume reads are already ordered

param.name: readRegex
param.help: Names are parsed to extract: tile/region, x coordinate and y coordinate, to estimate optical duplication rate
param.label: Regular expression that can be used to parse read names in the incoming SAM file

param.name: optDupeDist
param.help: e.g. 5-10 pixels. Later Illumina software versions multiply pixel values by 10, in which case 50-100.
param.label: The maximum offset between two duplicate clusters in order to consider them optical duplicates.
